text: Yadira D. Caraveo (born December 23, 1980) is an American politician and pediatrician. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was a member of the Colorado House of Representatives from 2019 to 2023. Caraveo was the U.S. representative for Colorado's 8th congressional district from 2023 to 2025. She was Colorado's first Latina member of Congress. In November 2024, she lost her re-election to Republican Gabe Evans. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Yadira Caraveo
